name: Particle Art - Genesis
description:
This is a VERY early stage of development game.

You'll get a novel breakout/arkanoid that tries to make the most of the classic mechanics by adding a few things :

- Element types to the game. Ice blocks break what is down them when killed by an ice ball. Fire blocks explode when killed by a fire ball

- You can switch the paddle type giving said type to the ball when it bounces on it

- You can go up / down with your paddle, making it go faster / slower and changing the speed of the ball when it bounces on it. 
- Colliding balls will merge into one more powerful ball
